scenes.name: David's Return from Taiwan
scenes.scenario: Didn't David just come back from Taiwan? Why don't you ask him some questions about his trip on your ride home on the subway?
objectives: I can ask friends about the activities that they did.

scenes.name: Pre-assessment - Chinese 1
scenes.scenario: Hey there. I'm M.I.R.I, the Mandarin Intelligence Robot Interpreter. I'm here to help you on your journey to Shanghai!
objectives: I can invite and make plans with someone to do something or go somewhere.
I can ask about someone's family.
I can ask questions about what other people like.
I can answer questions about what I like and dislike.

scenes.name: Review of Basic Questions
scenes.scenario: There's a fellow student hanging out at the school cafeteria. Let's meet him!
objectives: I can say or write something about the members of my family and ask about someone’s family.
I can ask and say a home address and e-mail address.
I can ask and say someone’s nationality.
